attributes.action: Stop the sale off concert/gig tickets on eaby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Are you sick off being unable to see your favourite band performing live?

Ebay was very quick to stop the sale of the Princess Diana concert tickets to stop the touts making money.(why stop sale for one and not others)

This policy must be extended for all live music events? to stop the touts!

I have had to use ebay to purchase tickets for three concerts this year, at double the face value of the ticket. 
Do these sellers pay TAX on there profits? 

I contest that this practise must stop.

It is illegal to sell tickets for football matches in this country I urge the PM to extend this to the sale of gig and concert tickets on EBAY.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
